titles.title: PAVE Act of 2016
Providing Accountability for Veterans Affairs Executives Act of 2016

To amend title 38 and title 5, United States Code, to require the Secretary of Veterans Affairs and other officials of the Department of Veterans Affairs to receive health care from the Department, and for other purposes.
PAVE Act of 2016

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

term.name: Government employee pay, benefits, personnel management

bill.summary:
Providing Accountability for Veterans Affairs Executives Act of 2016 or the PAVE Act of 2016
This bill requires the Secretary of Veterans Affairs and other specified officials of the Department of Veterans Affairs (VA), as a condition of office and employment and for the duration of their terms, to receive hospital care or medical services (other than emergency medical services) solely from the VA.
